title: Attack-Move-Click binding no longer works since yesterday's update
body:
I've had attack move click bound to the left mouse button for years, but since yesterday it hasn't been working. I replaced the input.ini file with the one I normally use, but it still isn't working.

replies.body: That mouse key is reserved so there isn't actually a method to bind that.  Any modifications made can definitely result in issues or trouble.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out and see what we can do.  We'll get back to you!
the persisted settings file didn't have anything in it after the patch for me. i had to delete it and replace it with my backup to get it to work again. happened on multiple accounts.
